title: How to Make Sinless Sugar Cookies

steps.headline: Beat 10 tablespoon of softened margarine and 1 cup of sugar in large bowl with a mixer at medium speed until the mixture is fluffy.
steps.description: Beat in 2 egg whites and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract in the mixture. Set aside.

steps.headline: Combine 2 cups of all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon of baking powder, and ½ teaspoon of salt in a medium bowl.
Add the flour mixture to the margarine mixture and combine.
Refrigerate the dough for three to four hours.
Roll out the dough on a clean and floured surface.
steps.description: Cut shapes out using a cookie cutter of your choice.

steps.headline: Spray a cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray and place the cookies on the sheet about one inch apart.
Bake for seven minutes or until the cookies are golden brown.
steps.description: Remove the cookies from the sheet and allow to cool.

steps.headline: Prepare the vanilla frosting by mixing together 2 cups of powdered sugar, 3 tablespoons of milk, and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract in a medium bowl.
Drizzle the vanilla frosting over the cookies and sprinkle the cinnamon on top of the frosting.

text: Preheat your oven to 375 °F (191 °C).  Beat 10 tablespoon of softened margarine and 1 cup of sugar in large bowl with a mixer at medium speed until the mixture is fluffy. Beat in 2 egg whites and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract in the mixture. Set aside. Combine 2 cups of all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon of baking powder, and ½ teaspoon of salt in a medium bowl.  Add the flour mixture to the margarine mixture and combine.  Refrigerate the dough for three to four hours.  Roll out the dough on a clean and floured surface. Cut shapes out using a cookie cutter of your choice. Spray a cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray and place the cookies on the sheet about one inch apart.  Bake for seven minutes or until the cookies are golden brown. Remove the cookies from the sheet and allow to cool. Prepare the vanilla frosting by mixing together 2 cups of powdered sugar, 3 tablespoons of milk, and 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract in a medium bowl.  Drizzle the vanilla frosting over the cookies and sprinkle the cinnamon on top of the frosting.  Finished.
